mapper.select: SELECT matching_id, user1_id, user2_id, matching_status, matching_start, matching_finish FROM matchings WHERE user1_id = #{userId} OR user2_id = #{userId} ORDER BY matching_start DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO matchings (user1_id, user2_id, matching_status, matching_start, matching_finish) VALUES (#{user1Id}, #{user2Id}, #{matchingStatus}, #{matchingStart}, #{matchingFinish})
